Constructor Detail

ClientSendThread

public ClientSendThread(Connection c,
                        DisplayMonitor disp_monitor)
Create client send thread. The send thread subscribes it mailbox to the display monitor in order to receive post to all meassages.

Parameters:
c, - Conneciton to camera server.
